title: Panel, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal, cotton
Technique: tapestry-woven
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Horizontal panel of slit tapestry. Cotton warp with weft of polychrome silks, and gold metallic thread. Design of realistically worked flowers – chrysanthemums, wisteria, lilies, peonies, etc.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, late 19th–early 20th century.
late 19th–early 20th century. Medium: silk, metal, cotton
Technique: tapestry-woven. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-27.
